ai_agents.name: Adala
ai_agents.description: Adala is an Autonomous Data (Labeling) Agent framework. It features reliable agents built on ground truth, controllable output with flexible constraints, specialization in data processing, autonomous learning, and a flexible, extensible, and easily customizable runtime.

ai_agents.name: Agent4Rec
ai_agents.description: Agent4Rec is a recommender system simulator that utilizes 1,000 LLM-empowered generative agents. These agents, initialized from the MovieLens-1M dataset, embody varied social traits and preferences and interact with personalized movie recommendations.

ai_agents.name: AgentForge
ai_agents.description: A low-code, LLM-agnostic framework for the swift creation, testing, and iteration of AI-powered autonomous agents and Cognitive Architectures. It supports multiple LLM models, customizable memory management, and is database-agnostic.

ai_agents.name: AgentGPT
ai_agents.description: A browser-based, no-code platform where you can assign a goal to an agent and witness it create an execution plan and take actions. It uses OpenAI functions and supports various databases.

ai_agents.name: AgentPilot
ai_agents.description: A desktop application to build, manage, and chat with agents. It is integrated with Open Interpreter and MemGPT and features group chats.

ai_agents.name: Agents
ai_agents.description: A library for building language agents with features like long-short term memory, tool usage, web navigation, multi-agent communication with an LLM-based controller, human-agent interaction, and symbolic control via SOPs.

ai_agents.name: AgentVerse
ai_agents.description: A platform that assembles multiple agents to collaboratively accomplish tasks and allows for custom environments for observing or interacting with them.

ai_agents.name: AI Legion
ai_agents.description: An LLM-powered autonomous agent platform and framework in TypeScript for agents who can work together to accomplish tasks, with interaction done via console.

ai_agents.name: Aider
ai_agents.description: A command-line tool that lets you pair program with GPT-3.5/GPT-4 to edit code stored in your local git repository. It works well with pre-existing, larger codebases.

ai_agents.name: AIlice
ai_agents.description: An agent in the form of a chatbot that independently plans tasks given in natural language and dynamically creates an agents-calling tree to execute them, featuring fault tolerance and self-expansion capabilities.

ai_agents.name: AutoGen
ai_agents.description: A framework from Microsoft for developing LLM applications with multiple conversational agents that can collaborate to solve tasks, interact with humans, and simplify complex workflows.

ai_agents.name: AutoGPT
ai_agents.description: An experimental open-source attempt to make GPT-4 fully autonomous. It chains together LLM "thoughts" to achieve goals, with internet access, memory management, and extensibility with plugins.

ai_agents.name: Automata
ai_agents.description: An agent that takes your project as context, receives tasks, and executes instructions. It aims to evolve into a fully autonomous, self-programming AI system using novel code search algorithms.

ai_agents.name: AutoPR
ai_agents.description: An AI-generated pull requests agent. When triggered by a label on an issue, it will plan a fix, write the code, push a branch, and open a pull request.

ai_agents.name: Autonomous HR Chatbot
ai_agents.description: A prototype enterprise application of an Autonomous HR Assistant powered by GPT-3.5. It can answer HR-related queries autonomously using tools like a timekeeping policy document and employee data.

ai_agents.name: BabyAGI
ai_agents.description: A pared-down, simple framework for an AI-powered task management system. It creates, prioritizes, and executes tasks based on the result of previous tasks and a predefined objective, using OpenAI and a vector search.

ai_agents.name: BabyBeeAGI
ai_agents.description: An expansion of BabyAGI with a more complex task management prompt, allowing for more comprehensive analysis and synthesis of information and handling multiple functions.

ai_agents.name: BabyCatAGI
ai_agents.description: A lightweight mod of BabyBeeAGI with just 300 lines of code. It features a one-time task creation agent, task dependencies, and tools for search and text completion.

ai_agents.name: BabyDeerAGI
ai_agents.description: A mod of BabyAGI with ~350 lines of code. It features parallel task processing, is optimized for GPT-3.5-turbo, and includes a user input tool and query rewriting.

ai_agents.name: BabyElfAGI
ai_agents.description: A mod of BabyDeerAGI that includes a skills class for creating new skills, a dynamic task list example, a beta reflection agent, and the ability to read, write, and review its own code.

ai_agents.name: BabyCommandAGI
ai_agents.description: An AI agent based on BabyAGI that executes shell commands to test the combination of a command-line interface and an LLM. It can handle tasks like automatic programming and environment setup.

ai_agents.name: BabyFoxAGI
ai_agents.description: A mod of BabyAGI featuring self-improving task lists through a reflection method (FOXY) and a novel chat UI with a parallel tasks panel. It includes new skills like DALL-E image generation and a music player.

ai_agents.name: BambooAI
ai_agents.description: An agent for data exploration and analysis designed for non-programmers. It runs in a loop, maintains memory, builds prompts dynamically, and generates, debugs, and executes Python code for analysis and plotting.

ai_agents.name: BeeBot
ai_agents.description: An early-stage research project for executing a wide range of tasks autonomously. It is currently a work in progress and not intended for production usage.

ai_agents.name: Blinky
ai_agents.description: An open-source AI debugging agent for VSCode inspired by SWE-agent. It uses LLMs, the Language Server Protocol (LSP), and print statement debugging to identify and fix backend code errors.

ai_agents.name: Bloop
ai_agents.description: A GPT-4 powered semantic code search engine that allows you to find code in local and remote repositories using natural language, regex, and filtered queries.

ai_agents.name: BondAI
ai_agents.description: A highly capable, autonomous AI Agent with a CLI, RESTful/WebSocket API, Docker image, and a suite of integrated tools including a powerful Code Interpreter and data query capabilities.

ai_agents.name: bumpgen
ai_agents.description: An AI agent that keeps npm dependencies up-to-date by bumping a package's version and then automatically generating the code fixes required for breaking changes.

ai_agents.name: Cal.ai
ai_agents.description: An open-source AI scheduling assistant built on Cal.com. It can book meetings, summarize your week, and find available time with others based on natural language commands.

ai_agents.name: CAMEL
ai_agents.description: An open-source library and community for the study of autonomous and communicative agents. It uses a role-playing architecture where an AI user agent gives instructions to an AI assistant agent to complete tasks.

ai_agents.name: ChatArena
ai_agents.description: A Multi-Agent Language Game Environment for LLMs designed to develop the communication and collaboration capabilities of AIs through interactive environments and user-friendly interfaces.

ai_agents.name: ChatDev
ai_agents.description: A virtual software company driven by multiple intelligent agents (CEO, CPO, programmer, tester, etc.) that collaborate to develop software from design to documentation in a structured, customizable framework.

ai_agents.name: ChemCrow
ai_agents.description: An open-source LangChain agent designed for the accurate solution of reasoning-intensive chemical tasks. It integrates 13 expert-designed tools to augment LLM performance in chemistry.

ai_agents.name: Clippy
ai_agents.description: An AI agent designed to develop code for or with the user. It can plan, write, debug, and test some projects autonomously and can be guided with feedback for harder tasks.

ai_agents.name: CodeFuse-ChatBot
ai_agents.description: An intelligent assistant serving the entire software development lifecycle, powered by a Multi-Agent Framework and integrated with DevOps toolkits and Code/Doc Repo RAG.

ai_agents.name: Cody by ajhous44
ai_agents.description: An AI assistant designed to let you interactively query and navigate your codebase using natural language, utilizing vector embeddings and OpenAI's language models.

ai_agents.name: Cody by Sourcegraph
ai_agents.description: An AI code assistant from Sourcegraph that writes code and answers questions for you by reading your entire codebase and the code graph.

ai_agents.name: Continue
ai_agents.description: An open-source autopilot for software development that brings the power of ChatGPT to VS Code, allowing you to answer coding questions, edit in natural language, and generate files from scratch.

ai_agents.name: CrewAI
ai_agents.description: A cutting-edge framework for orchestrating role-playing, autonomous AI agents. By fostering collaborative intelligence, it empowers agents to work together seamlessly to tackle complex tasks.

ai_agents.name: data-to-paper
ai_agents.description: A framework for systematically navigating AI to perform end-to-end scientific research, starting from raw data and concluding with comprehensive, transparent, and human-verifiable scientific papers.

ai_agents.name: Databerry
ai_agents.description: (Pivoted to Chaindesk) A super-easy no-code platform for creating AI chatbots trained on your own data, which can then be deployed to your website, Slack, and other platforms.

ai_agents.name: DemoGPT
ai_agents.description: An agent that leverages Language Models to provide fast and effective demo creation for applications. It automates the prototyping process by generating application code from prompts.

ai_agents.name: DevGPT
ai_agents.description: A team of virtual AI developers (Product Manager, Developer, DevOps) that builds microservices based on your specifications, aiming to make software development seamless and efficient.

ai_agents.name: Devika
ai_agents.description: An Agentic AI Software Engineer that can understand high-level human instructions, break them down into steps, research relevant information, and write code to achieve a given objective. Aims to be a competitive open-source alternative to Devin.

ai_agents.name: Devon
ai_agents.description: An open-source alternative to the AI software engineer Devin, created by Entropy Research.

ai_agents.name: DevOpsGPT
ai_agents.description: An AI-Driven Software Development Automation Solution that combines LLMs with DevOps tools to convert natural language requirements into working software, improving efficiency and shortening development cycles.

ai_agents.name: dotagent
ai_agents.description: An agent management system that facilitates creating robust AI applications and autonomous agents. It enables deployment across cloud, PCs, or mobile devices and features a powerful prompt compiler.

ai_agents.name: Eidolon
ai_agents.description: Eidolon is an open-source SDK for creating AI agents with pluggable, modular components.

ai_agents.name: English Compiler
ai_agents.description: An AI-based compiler for converting English-based markdown functional specifications directly into functional code.

ai_agents.name: evo.ninja
ai_agents.description: An AI agent that adapts itself in real-time based on the task at hand by utilizing pre-defined agent personas tailored to specific domains, selecting the best one for each iteration.

ai_agents.name: FastAgency
ai_agents.description: An open-source framework designed to accelerate the transition from prototype to production for multi-agent AI workflows, enabling developers to scale AutoGen prototypes into production-ready applications.

ai_agents.name: Flowise
ai_agents.description: An open-source low-code tool for developers to build customized LLM orchestration flows and AI agents using a drag-and-drop UI.

ai_agents.name: Friday
ai_agents.description: A developer assistant for Node.js capable of creating a whole project from a core prompt and unlimited additional prompts representing different parts of the application.

ai_agents.name: GeniA
ai_agents.description: An engineering platform AI team member that can work alongside you in your production environment, executing tasks in your dev & cloud environments (AWS, k8s, Argo, GitHub, etc.).

ai_agents.name: Godmode
ai_agents.description: A web platform inspired by Auto-GPT and BabyAGI for conducting various tasks through a nice UI. It supports both GPT-3.5 and GPT-4.

ai_agents.name: GPT Discord
ai_agents.description: A robust, all-in-one GPT interface for Discord, supporting multi-modality, code interpretation via E2B, data analysis, web search, document Q&A, AI moderation, and image generation.

ai_agents.name: GPT Engineer
ai_agents.description: An AI agent that generates an entire codebase based on a prompt. It's designed to be easily adapted and extended, allowing you to specify the "identity" of the AI agent to customize how it codes.

ai_agents.name: GPT Migrate
ai_agents.description: An agent that easily migrates your codebase from one framework or language to another. It supports different LLMs and can generate and run unit tests for the new codebase.

ai_agents.name: GPT Pilot
ai_agents.description: A dev tool that writes scalable apps from scratch while the developer oversees the implementation. It is a research project to see how GPT-4 can be used to generate production-ready apps.

ai_agents.name: GPT Researcher
ai_agents.description: An autonomous agent that conducts comprehensive online research on any given topic. It uses "planner" and "execution" agents to generate detailed, factual, and unbiased research reports with parallelized work for increased speed.

ai_agents.name: GPT Runner
ai_agents.description: A private-first tool for conversing with your files without embeddings or a vector database. It also acts as an AI Prompt Storybook and supports both OpenAI and Anthropic models.

ai_agents.name: GPTSwarm
ai_agents.description: A graph-based framework for building and optimizing LLM-based agents. It allows agents to be represented as computational graphs and enables automatic self-organization and self-improvement of agent swarms.

ai_agents.name: IX
ai_agents.description: A platform for building, debugging, and deploying collaborative Agents and cognitive workflows. It includes a no-code graph editor, a scaling worker fleet, and a multi-user chat interface.

ai_agents.name: JARVIS
ai_agents.description: A system from Microsoft to connect LLMs with the ML community. It uses ChatGPT for task planning, selects expert models from Hugging Face, executes them, and integrates the results to generate a response.

ai_agents.name: Langroid
ai_agents.description: An intuitive, lightweight, and extensible Python framework for building LLM-powered applications using a multi-agent paradigm. It supports various LLMs and includes specialized agents for documents, SQL, and tabular data.

ai_agents.name: Lemon Agent
ai_agents.description: A Plan-Validate-Solve (PVS) agent for accurate and reproducible workflow automation. It uses a Planner Agent and a Solver Agent and asks for approval at relevant steps to ensure intended actions are executed.

ai_agents.name: LLM Agents
ai_agents.description: A minimalistic library for building agents that leverage LLMs to automate tasks through a loop of commands and tool integrations, such as executing Python code and conducting web searches.

ai_agents.name: LLM Stack
ai_agents.description: A no-code platform to build LLM agents, workflows, and applications with your data. It supports all major model providers and allows you to build agents like AI SDRs or Research Analysts without writing code.

ai_agents.name: Local GPT
ai_agents.description: An open-source initiative that allows you to converse with your documents on your local device using GPT models, ensuring 100% privacy as no data leaves your computer.

ai_agents.name: Loop GPT
ai_agents.description: A modular and extensible re-implementation of Auto-GPT as a proper Python package. It features a "Plug N Play" API, minimal prompt overhead, and human-in-the-loop capabilities.

ai_agents.name: L2MAC
ai_agents.description: A multi-agent generation framework that, from a single input prompt, can generate an extensive unbounded output, such as an entire codebase or a complete book, with automatic error correction.

ai_agents.name: Maige
ai_agents.description: A codebase agent that runs on new GitHub issues and pull requests. Its core features are labelling, assigning, and answering questions. It can search the codebase, spin up a sandbox to run scripts, and write basic code.

ai_agents.name: Magick
ai_agents.description: An AIDE (AI Integrated Development Environment) for creating, deploying, scaling, and monetizing useful AI agents and prompt chaining. It provides a visual development environment for cognitive architecture.

ai_agents.name: MemFree
ai_agents.description: An open-source Hybrid AI Search Engine to get accurate answers from the Internet, bookmarks, notes, and documents. Features one-click Chrome bookmarks sync and self-hosted services.

ai_agents.name: MemGPT
ai_agents.description: A system that intelligently manages different memory tiers in LLMs to effectively provide extended context within the LLM's limited context window. It allows you to chat with local files or SQL databases.

ai_agents.name: Mentat
ai_agents.description: An AI tool that assists with any coding task, right from your command line. Unlike other tools, it can coordinate edits across multiple files and already has the context of your project.

ai_agents.name: MetaGPT
ai_agents.description: A multi-agent framework that, given a one-line requirement, outputs PRDs, designs, tasks, or a full repository. It assigns different roles (product manager, architect, engineer) to GPTs to form a collaborative software entity.

ai_agents.name: Mini AGI
ai_agents.description: A minimal general-purpose autonomous agent based on GPT-3.5/GPT-4. It combines a robust prompt with a minimal set of tools, chain-of-thought, and short-term memory with summarization, capable of inner monologue and self-criticism.

ai_agents.name: Multiagent Debate
ai_agents.description: An implementation of a paper where different instances of the same language model act as a "multiagent society" to generate and critique generations, resulting in more factually accurate and reasoned final answers.

ai_agents.name: Multi GPT
ai_agents.description: An experimental multi-agent system where multiple "expertGPTs" collaborate to perform a task, each with their own short and long-term memory and the ability to communicate with each other.

ai_agents.name: MutahunterAI
ai_agents.description: An open-source AI agent that accelerates developer productivity and code security. It uses a mutation testing engine to generate unit tests that specifically target vulnerabilities in your code.

ai_agents.name: NLSOM
ai_agents.description: Natural Language-Based Societies of Mind, a concept where societies of agents (LLMs, APIs, role-players) communicate in natural language and use a collaborative "Mindstorm" process to solve tasks.

ai_agents.name: OpenAgents
ai_agents.description: An Open Platform for Language Agents in the Wild. It's a fully open-source, extensible ChatGPT Plus Replica for researchers, developers, and general users, featuring a Chat Web UI and productive agents.

ai_agents.name: OpenAGI
ai_agents.description: An open-source AGI R&D platform that enables agents for both benchmark and open-ended tasks. It supports multi-modality tool learning, non-linear task planning, and continuous self-improvement through RLTF.

ai_agents.name: OpenDevin
ai_agents.description: An open-source project born out of a desire to replicate, enhance, and innovate beyond the original Devin AI software engineer model by engaging the open-source community.

ai_agents.name: Open Interpreter
ai_agents.description: An open-source code interpreter that runs locally, letting LLMs execute code on your computer to complete tasks like summarizing PDFs, visualizing datasets, and controlling your browser from a terminal interface.

ai_agents.name: Pezzo
ai_agents.description: A development toolkit designed to streamline prompt design, version management, publishing, collaboration, troubleshooting, and observability for AI applications, with a focus on cost transparency.

ai_agents.name: Private GPT
ai_agents.description: A tool for private interaction with your documents without needing an internet connection. It is a test project to validate the feasibility of a fully private solution for question answering using LLMs.

ai_agents.name: PromethAI
ai_agents.description: A personalized AI assistant that decomposes problems, offers solutions, and lets you use Agent actions to automate your flows. It helps with nutrition and other goals, remembering past preferences.

ai_agents.name: React Agent
ai_agents.description: An experimental, open-source, autonomous LLM Agent that generates and composes React components from user stories, based on atomic design principles.

ai_agents.name: Self-operating computer
ai_agents.description: An agent that uses multimodal models to operate a computer. Using the same inputs and outputs as a human, the model views the screen and decides on a series of mouse and keyboard actions to reach an objective.

ai_agents.name: Smol developer
ai_agents.description: Your own junior AI developer. It is a human-centric, coherent whole program synthesis agent that can be deployed via the E2B UI to develop, debug, and decompile projects.

ai_agents.name: Stackwise
ai_agents.description: A VS Code extension that writes and imports Node.js functions for you. You explain what you want a function to do, and the AI builds it, reducing context switching.

ai_agents.name: Superagent
ai_agents.description: A tool that simplifies the configuration and deployment of LLM Agents to production without coding. It provides features like built-in memory, document retrieval, powerful tools, webhooks, and cron jobs.

ai_agents.name: SuperAGI
ai_agents.description: An open-source autonomous AI framework to enable the development and deployment of autonomous agents. It features a graphical user interface, concurrent agent execution, and agent trajectory fine-tuning.

ai_agents.name: Suspicion Agent
ai_agents.description: A project based on a paper about playing Imperfect Information Games with a Theory of Mind aware GPT-4, delving into the applicability of its learned knowledge for such games.

ai_agents.name: SWE Agent
ai_agents.description: An open-source Devin alternative that resolves software engineering issues in GitHub repositories. It works by interacting with a specialized terminal (Agent-Computer Interface) that allows it to open, edit, test, and submit code.

ai_agents.name: Sweep
ai_agents.description: A Github assistant that helps fix small bugs and implement small features. You create an issue, prepend the title with "Sweep:", and let the agent handle the pull request creation.

ai_agents.name: Taxy AI
ai_agents.description: A full browser automation agent that uses GPT-4 to control your browser and perform repetitive actions on your behalf based on ad-hoc instructions.

ai_agents.name: Teenage AGI
ai_agents.description: A BabyAGI-inspired agent that can recall infinite memory from a Pinecone vector database. It "thinks" before making an action and doesn't lose memory after being shut down.

ai_agents.name: UFO
ai_agents.description: A UI-Focused dual-agent framework from Microsoft designed to fulfill user requests on the Windows OS by seamlessly navigating and operating within and across multiple applications.

ai_agents.name: Vanna.AI
ai_agents.description: An open-source Python-based AI SQL agent that you train on your schema. It writes complex SQL queries in seconds, allowing you to ask questions in natural language and get back executable SQL.

ai_agents.name: Voyager
ai_agents.description: An LLM-powered embodied lifelong learning agent in Minecraft that continuously explores, acquires diverse skills, and makes novel discoveries without human intervention, using an automatic curriculum and a skill library.

ai_agents.name: Web3 GPT
ai_agents.description: An agent that can write and deploy smart contracts to EVM blockchains. It allows users to interact with blockchains using natural language, leveraging account abstraction and ChatGPT.

ai_agents.name: “Westworld” simulation
ai_agents.description: A multi-agent simulation library with the goal to simulate and optimize systems with multiple interacting agents. Inspired by the "Generative Agents" paper, it simulates social behaviors in a sandbox environment.

ai_agents.name: WorkGPT
ai_agents.description: A GPT agent framework for invoking APIs. You give it a directive and an array of APIs (via an OpenAPI file), and it will converse with the AI until its directive is complete, now using OpenAI's function invocation feature.

ai_agents.name: Wren
ai_agents.description: An AI-powered data assistant and natural language interface to your databases. It helps retrieve results and insights quickly and effortlessly, without the need for SQL coding.

ai_agents.name: XAgent
ai_agents.description: An open-source experimental LLM-driven autonomous agent that can automatically solve various tasks. It features a dual-loop mechanism and uses function calling to interact with tools like a file editor, web browser, and shell.

ai_agents.name: yAgents
ai_agents.description: An Agent-Builder Agent made by Yeager.ai, capable of designing, coding, and debugging its own tools. It is built on LangChain and features an interactive CLI and session persistent memory.

ai_agents.name: Yourgoal
ai_agents.description: A Swift implementation and port of BabyAGI, an AI-powered task management system that uses OpenAI and Pinecone APIs to create, prioritize, and execute tasks based on a predefined objective.

ai_agents.name: Ability AI
ai_agents.description: A platform for empowering businesses with secure, people-centric autonomous AI agents. Currently in an early version.

ai_agents.name: Adept AI
ai_agents.description: An ML research and product lab building general intelligence by enabling humans and computers to work together creatively. Their goal is an AI teammate that can interact with everything on your computer.

ai_agents.name: AGENTS.inc
ai_agents.description: Provides AI agents for specific tasks such as a Global News Radar, Company Identification, EU Policy Watch, Report generation, Scientific Knowledge, and Patent Analysis.

ai_agents.name: AgentScale
ai_agents.description: A personal AI assistant that can act as your email writer, calendar scheduler, and internet surfer.

ai_agents.name: Aide by Codestory
ai_agents.description: An AI code interpreter and AI-powered mod of VSCode. It can scan a codebase, identify the root cause of a bug, make the fix, and auto-generate tests. Currently available for JS/TS.

ai_agents.name: AilaFlow
ai_agents.description: A no-code platform for building AI agents for productivity and other use cases. You can use a template and adjust it using a no-code editor to fit your needs.

ai_agents.name: Airkit.ai
ai_agents.description: A platform for building, testing, and deploying Agents. It includes a browser-based studio for managing prompts and tools, built-in memory management, and 1-click deployment.

ai_agents.name: Airplane Autopilot
ai_agents.description: A developer-centric platform for building internal UIs and workflows. Autopilot is their AI assistant for turning APIs, SQL queries, and scripts into apps for the entire team.

ai_agents.name: Aomni
ai_agents.description: An AI agent designed for business intelligence. It breaks down a high-level research question into a step-by-step plan and executes it using diverse tools, including a full web browser.

ai_agents.name: APIDNA
ai_agents.description: A platform with multiple AI agents for the instant integration of API endpoints. It simplifies and accelerates the software integration process using a no-code approach.

ai_agents.name: Artisian AI
ai_agents.description: A YC company creating the first human-like digital workers, called Artisans. These are advanced AI agents trained for specific roles like sales, with unique identities, memories, and skills.

ai_agents.name: Ask Pandi
ai_agents.description: An answer engine to search and generate knowledge. It compiles search results into a concise, distraction-free webpage with multi-modal answers and citations.

ai_agents.name: AskToSell
ai_agents.description: A platform to deploy and manage autonomous AI sales agents that close small deals. These agents contact leads, qualify them, prepare offers, handle objections, negotiate, and close deals.

ai_agents.name: AskYourDatabase
ai_agents.description: "ChatGPT for SQL." A platform that allows you to connect your SQL database and chat with your data in a ChatGPT-like interface to explore and visualize it without writing SQL.

ai_agents.name: Athena Intelligence
ai_agents.description: An AI-native analytics platform designed to accelerate analytics workflows for enterprise teams. It offers co-pilot and auto-pilot modes, learning users' workflows to allow for autonomous execution.

ai_agents.name: Avanzai
ai_agents.description: A platform that helps users build autonomous AI agents for finance, specifically for portfolio risk and asset allocation. Agents can scrape news, fetch real-time data, and write Python code for risk calculation.

ai_agents.name: Bardeen
ai_agents.description: An AI agent focused on automating repetitive tasks for productivity and sales workflows.

ai_agents.name: Beam
ai_agents.description: A platform providing a wide selection of intelligent AI agents for end-to-end process and workflow automation across various industries like healthcare, insurance, and customer service.

ai_agents.name: Blackbox AI
ai_agents.description: A coding LLM designed to transform the way we build software, aiming to accelerate the pace of innovation by making engineers 10x faster.

ai_agents.name: Blobr
ai_agents.description: An AI assistant that makes sense of your business data stored in siloed SaaS tools (Hubspot, Google Analytics, etc.). It helps reveal insights and understand customer patterns without technical effort.

ai_agents.name: BrainSoup
ai_agents.description: A local native app to build a team of custom AI agents that remember, learn, and work together on your PC. It is multimodal, reactive, autonomous, and features a sandboxed environment.

ai_agents.name: broadn
ai_agents.description: A no-code platform that helps non-technical people build AI products in minutes through an LLM-powered conversational interface and an agent architecture that automates complex backend/workflow operations.

ai_agents.name: Butternut AI
ai_agents.description: An AI tool for creating a fully-functioning, ready-to-launch website in 20 seconds with no coding required, full SEO optimization, and a user-friendly interface.

ai_agents.name: B2 AI
ai_agents.description: An autonomous autocomplete AI assistant for work. It allows you to share useful workflows with team members or schedule AI-powered recurring workflows with granular data controls.

ai_agents.name: ChatHelp
ai_agents.description: An AI-powered Business, Work, and Study Assistant. It features a private AI knowledge base, a website chat widget for customer support, and over 100 unique AI tools.

ai_agents.name: Claros AI Shopper
ai_agents.description: An AI personal shopper that finds you interesting products and learns your taste over time to give you the best results possible.

ai_agents.name: Claygent
ai_agents.description: An AI web scraper agent that can search and browse the web to find and summarize information for you, designed to replace manual account research for sales development representatives.

ai_agents.name: Code Autopilot
ai_agents.description: An AI assistant for your GitHub issues and pull requests. It can create entire features and fix bugs on complex GitHub projects from a text description.

ai_agents.name: Codegen
ai_agents.description: An agent that allows you to automatically solve tickets, write tests, and level up your development workflow with the power of GPT-4.

ai_agents.name: CodeWP
ai_agents.description: An AI agent specifically designed for WordPress development, featuring domain-specific AI modes, tools, and features to speed up the creation of WordPress websites.

ai_agents.name: Codium AI
ai_agents.description: A multi-purpose AI coding assistant for developers that generates meaningful tests, covers edge cases, suggests code improvements, and provides code explanations, all inside your IDE.

ai_agents.name: Commit
ai_agents.description: A Career Copilot and AI agent for software developers that provides comprehensive job searches, accurate job recommendations based on skills, and AI-powered auto-applications.

ai_agents.name: Cognosys
ai_agents.description: A web-based version of agent platforms like AutoGPT or BabyAGI with a friendly user interface for building and running AI agents.

ai_agents.name: ContextQA
ai_agents.description: An agentic AI platform focused on software testing, aiming to provide complete test coverage automatically.

ai_agents.name: Cursor
ai_agents.description: An AI-first code editor designed for pair-programming with AI, featuring a VSCode-like user interface.

ai_agents.name: Cykel
ai_agents.description: An AI co-pilot model that can interact with any UI, website, or API in response to natural language commands, aimed at general purpose productivity tasks.

ai_agents.name: Devin
ai_agents.description: The first AI software engineer. According to the demo, it can learn unfamiliar technologies, build and deploy apps end-to-end, and autonomously find and fix bugs in codebases.

ai_agents.name: Diagram
ai_agents.description: A suite of AI-powered design tools (acquired by Figma) for everything from copywriting to generating unique icons from text, working directly inside design tools like Figma.

ai_agents.name: Docket AI
ai_agents.description: A personal AI Sales Engineer that empowers Account Executives in complex B2B sales. It provides instant sales answers, automated RFP responses, and insights from top producers.

ai_agents.name: Dosu
ai_agents.description: An AI teammate that lives in your GitHub repo, helping to respond to issues in the user's native language, triage bugs, build better documentation, and resolve stale issues.

ai_agents.name: Dot
ai_agents.description: A virtual assistant that allows you to chat with your Data Warehouse (e.g., Snowflake, BigQuery) or Semantic Layer (e.g., Looker, dbt) to answer business questions instantly.

ai_agents.name: Duckie AI
ai_agents.description: A YC-backed platform that lets engineers manage a team of AI software development companions (Ducklings) to complete end-to-end feature development, from design to implementation.

ai_agents.name: Ellipsis
ai_agents.description: (Previously BitBuilder) An agent for automated code reviews and bug fixes. It can write code, review changes, address comments, and answer questions based on a GitHub/GitLab issue.

ai_agents.name: encode
ai_agents.description: A fully autonomous AI software engineer, currently in alpha, that works with you and your team to get development work done.

ai_agents.name: Factory
ai_agents.description: A platform, currently in alpha, for "Coding Droids" - autonomous agents capable of building software from end to end, going beyond simple coding copilots.

ai_agents.name: Fine
ai_agents.description: A platform to deploy, manage, and run AI agents that serve as your virtual teammates. It is built for teams, with a focus on organizational memory, collaboration, and privacy (runs locally).

ai_agents.name: Fine Tuner
ai_agents.description: (Pivoted to Synthflow) A no-code platform that enables users to create and deploy custom AI agents and components without any coding, featuring rapid API deployment.

ai_agents.name: Fixie
ai_agents.description: A cloud-based platform-as-a-service that allows developers to build smart agents that couple LLMs with back-end logic to interface with data, systems, and tools.

ai_agents.name: Floode
ai_agents.description: An executive agent that automates communication busywork across all your tools: emails, social media DMs, calendar, Notion, etc. It can craft messages, auto-sort, auto-schedule, and summarize.

ai_agents.name: GitHub Copilot X
ai_agents.description: An AI-powered software developer from GitHub. It acts as an AI pair programmer with chat and terminal interfaces, support for pull requests, and early adoption of OpenAI’s GPT-4.

ai_agents.name: GitLab Duo
ai_agents.description: A suite of AI-powered capabilities for DevSecOps workflows. It's a toolbox of features integrated into the GitLab platform to help teams across the entire software development lifecycle.

ai_agents.name: GitWit
ai_agents.description: A platform that uses a GPT-based agent to generate code and git to track changes. It can spawn and modify codebases using a single prompt and is aimed at full-stack developers.

ai_agents.name: GoCharlie
ai_agents.description: A multimodal content creation autonomous agent.

ai_agents.name: Graphlit
ai_agents.description: An API-first data platform for building applications with AI. Built on a serverless, cloud-native platform, it simplifies complex data workflows, including ingestion, knowledge extraction, and semantic search.

ai_agents.name: Grit
ai_agents.description: A platform for automating code migrations and dependency upgrades. It uses machine learning and static analysis to auto-generate pull requests for cleaning up technical debt.

ai_agents.name: Gumloop
ai_agents.description: (Previously AgentHub) A platform to build and host LLM-powered automations for any workflow. It features a no-code, drag-and-click editor to connect a library of nodes.

ai_agents.name: Heights Platform
ai_agents.description: A platform for course creators, community builders, and coaches. It includes a Heights AI Chat for editing products and answering questions, and a personal autonomous AI Coach to help you accomplish goals.

ai_agents.name: Hex Magic
ai_agents.description: A suite of powerful AI features designed to augment data professionals. Hex Magic can explain, document, and generate code, with deep context awareness of database schemas and project history.

ai_agents.name: Heymoon.ai
ai_agents.description: A personal assistant for life designed to keep you on top of your calendar, tasks, and information. Currently in a beta version.

ai_agents.name: iMean.AI
ai_agents.description: A product that automates browser tasks end-to-end deterministically. Unlike other solutions, it can automate the full task for you and get you real results.

ai_agents.name: Input
ai_agents.description: An AI-powered teammate (or team of assistants) that can collaborate with you on code. Agents do the work and push it to GitHub autonomously.

ai_agents.name: Instrukt
ai_agents.description: A terminal environment for interacting with AI agents. It enables users to create and instruct agents, generate document indexes, and attach tools, all within a terminal interface and secure Docker containers.

ai_agents.name: Invicta
ai_agents.description: A platform to build your first team of Autonomous AI Agents. It features a synchronized knowledge base, self-improving agents, is LLM agnostic, and allows agents to collaborate as a team.

ai_agents.name: Julius
ai_agents.description: An intelligent data analyst tool that interprets, analyzes, and visualizes complex data in an intuitive, user-friendly notebook interface. It's described as "Jupyter Notebooks on steroids."

ai_agents.name: Kadoa
ai_agents.description: A platform for web scraping on autopilot with AI. It uses LLMs to generate web scrapers and data processing steps on the fly that adapt to website changes, requiring no coding.

ai_agents.name: Juno
ai_agents.description: An AI-moderated research platform that conducts unsupervised, multilingual, and autonomous user interviews to collect rich human insights for qualitative research.

ai_agents.name: Kompas AI
ai_agents.description: An advanced AI assistant for your team, designed to enhance productivity by processing multiple tasks simultaneously. It supports various models including GPT-4-turbo, Gemini, and Claude 2.

ai_agents.name: Kusho
ai_agents.description: An AI agent for API testing. It instantly generates and runs exhaustive test suites for your APIs from a Postman collection, helping you push code effortlessly and save hours of manual effort.

ai_agents.name: Kwal
ai_agents.description: A platform providing AI-powered voice agents specifically for recruiting tasks.

ai_agents.name: Lindy
ai_agents.description: An AI assistant that can help with daily tasks. It triages your email, handles calendar conflicts, provides daily briefings, manages contracts, and takes meeting notes. Currently in beta.

ai_agents.name: Lutra AI
ai_agents.description: A platform for creating personal AI workflows and apps. It converses with you to understand your goals and then writes code to produce specialized agents for tasks like creating personalized newsletters or labeling emails.

ai_agents.name: Magic Loops
ai_agents.description: A platform that makes personal automation easy by combining generative AI with code. It allows anyone, including non-programmers, to set up repeatable tasks and automated workflows.

ai_agents.name: Makedraft
ai_agents.description: An AI that generates and edits frontend HTML, Javascript, and Alpine.js components based on text prompts. You can then copy the code to any project.

ai_agents.name: Manaflow
ai_agents.description: A YC-backed platform that empowers non-technical teams to automate recurring technical business workflows that require analyzing data, connecting APIs, and taking actions.

ai_agents.name: Minion AI
ai_agents.description: A general-purpose AI agent project from the creator of GitHub Copilot. Currently in the waitlist stage.

ai_agents.name: MultiOn
ai_agents.description: An AI agent that can control a web browser to perform tasks like booking a flight or ordering a burger. It uses a custom plugin to allow ChatGPT to control a local Chrome browser and can recursively spawn sub-agents.

ai_agents.name: Mutable AI
ai_agents.description: A platform for AI-Accelerated Software Development. It features AI autocomplete, one-click production quality code generation, and prompt-driven development.

ai_agents.name: Naut
ai_agents.description: A platform to build your own team of AI agents that work for you. Currently in an early access stage with a waitlist.

ai_agents.name: NexusGPT
category: Technical challenges of building AI products
Business/marketing challenges of building AI products
ai_agents.description: A platform that enables anyone to build, finetune, and integrate autonomous AI agents without coding. It provides a marketplace of over 1000 ready-made agents and 1500 tools.

ai_agents.name: Otherside's AI Assistant - Hyperwrite
ai_agents.description: A Chrome extension and general-purpose AI agent that can take control of your browser and complete high-level tasks for you, like booking flights or managing your email.

ai_agents.name: Phind
ai_agents.description: A personal programming and research AI assistant that functions as an AI search engine and pair programmer.

ai_agents.name: Powerdrill AI
ai_agents.description: An AI agent SaaS service centered around personal and enterprise datasets. It enables you to use natural language to effortlessly interact with your data for tasks from simple Q&As to insightful BI analysis.

ai_agents.name: Proficient AI
ai_agents.description: A platform providing interaction APIs and SDKs for building user-facing AI agents quickly. It offers a technology-agnostic solution with ready-to-use UI components and an admin dashboard.

ai_agents.name: Promptly
ai_agents.description: A no-code platform to build generative AI agents, applications, and chatbots for your enterprise. It supports major model providers and allows you to integrate your own data.

ai_agents.name: Q, ChatGPT for Slack
ai_agents.description: An AI workforce on Slack designed for under-resourced SMEs. It functions like ChatGPT within your workspace, can read URLs and files, and is ideal for summarizing, brainstorming, and Q&A.

ai_agents.name: Questflow
ai_agents.description: A marketplace for autonomous AI workers, designed for SMBs. It allows users to discover and deploy AI agents for workflow automation and provides a no-code editor for creators to monetize their knowledge.

ai_agents.name: Rebyte
ai_agents.description: A Multi-AI agents builder platform built for creating generative AI applications.

ai_agents.name: Relevance AI
ai_agents.description: A platform to build your own "AI Workforce" - a digital team of agents equipped with tools specific to your business operations. It supports various LLM providers and multi-agent systems.

ai_agents.name: Saga
ai_agents.description: A digital AI assistant for your notes, tasks, and tools. It can help with generating content, brainstorming ideas, translation, and grammar checks.

ai_agents.name: Second
ai_agents.description: A YC-backed platform for automated migrations and upgrades for your code. It can migrate frameworks (e.g., Angular to React), libraries, and perform major version upgrades on enterprise codebases.

ai_agents.name: Sentius
ai_agents.description: A platform providing autonomous agents for the enterprise that can operate a browser to do tasks. It offers a suite of no-code tools to build, test, and deploy agents inside a company's secure perimeter.

ai_agents.name: ShopPal
ai_agents.description: A curated AI shopping assistant that aims to enhance and accompany your shopping experience by delivering summary insights, tailored recommendations, visual comparisons, and personalized deals.

ai_agents.name: Spell
ai_agents.description: A platform for delegating tasks to autonomous AI agents powered by GPT-4. These agents can use plugins to access APIs like Zapier, open links, manipulate files, and search the web.

ai_agents.name: Superluminal
ai_agents.description: An AI copilot for your product's data dashboard. It provides a React component or API that writes and securely executes Python code to answer questions and perform tasks, enabling customers to extract more value from data.

ai_agents.name: TalktoData
ai_agents.description: An AI Data Analyst that works with your CSV, Excel, Google Sheets, and SQL databases. It allows users to generate visualizations, ask follow-up questions, and refine requirements through chat.

ai_agents.name: Taskade
ai_agents.description: A platform to create, train, and run custom AI agents for tasks, automation, and workflows. It also features an AI generator for flowcharts and an AI chat assistant for media Q&A.

ai_agents.name: ThinkChain AI
ai_agents.description: A financial AI agent platform that provides a set of advanced AI agents for tasks like search, chain-of-thought reasoning, real-time financial analysis (DCF, LBO), and creating entire workflows.

ai_agents.name: Test Driver
ai_agents.description: An AI agent for QA in GitHub. You instruct it to test any pull request with natural language, and it will perform a test and send back a video and log recording of what occurred.

ai_agents.name: Tusk
ai_agents.description: A YC-backed AI engineer that helps product managers ship simple front-end changes fast. You assign a ticket to Tusk, and the AI writes, pushes, and tests the code for you.

ai_agents.name: Vortic
ai_agents.description: An AI agent platform focused on helping Insurance Sales and Claims. It aims to make it easy for enterprises to embed agents with pre-built toolkits for real-time value realization.

ai_agents.name: v0 by Vercel
ai_agents.description: A generative user interface system by Vercel Labs powered by AI. It generates copy-and-paste friendly React code based on Shadcn UI and Tailwind CSS from text prompts.

ai_agents.name: Wispy
ai_agents.description: A web-browsing AI assistant that can summarize content, compose content, explain things, or create quizzes for topics you are learning, all without leaving your browser.

ai_agents.name: Wordware
ai_agents.description: An all-in-one platform for deploying LLM applications, supporting models from OpenAI, Mistral, Anthropic, and more.

ai_agents.name: WorkBot
ai_agents.description: A privacy-centric conversational AI platform leveraging AI Agents to centralize knowledge, enrich collaboration, and facilitate streamlined automation. It can be connected to any database and application.

ai_agents.name: Zapier Central
ai_agents.description: An experimental AI workspace where you can work hand-in-hand with AI bots. You can teach bots to work across over 6,000 apps, give them access to data sources, and have them work even when you're not around.
